Work Objective
Seeking a challenging role in an organization as a Mechanical
Engineer where I can utilize my strength and concept that I
have learned. I would like to work in competitive environment,
where I can get Opportunities to meet new challenges to excel
and prove my persona to the infinite extent  with complete
satisfaction. My ultimate aim is grow with the company by
contributing my part in the achievement of organization goals
with my hard work, diligence and self confidence.
